name: Naic Church (Diocesan Shrine of the Immaculate Conception)
shortDescription: Historic 19th-century church and a notable landmark in Naic.

name: Naic Plaza
shortDescription: Central town plaza often used for community gatherings and events.

name: Naic Municipal Hall
shortDescription: Local government center providing various public services.

name: Naic Public Market
shortDescription: Bustling public market for fresh produce and local goods.

name: Naic Coastal Area
shortDescription: Scenic seaside spot popular for fishing and relaxing by the shore.

name: Naic National High School
shortDescription: One of the largest public secondary schools in the municipality.

name: Barangay Halang Covered Court
shortDescription: Local covered sports court for basketball and community activities.

name: San Roque Chapel
shortDescription: Small chapel serving the local San Roque community.

name: Naic Elementary School
shortDescription: Public elementary school near the center of Naic.

name: Naic Fish Port
shortDescription: Fishing port supplying fresh seafood to the local market.

name: Sabang Beachfront
shortDescription: Popular seaside area in Sabang, often visited by locals for fishing and picnics.

name: Sabang Barangay Hall
shortDescription: Local barangay hall providing public services for Sabang residents.

name: Sabang Elementary School
shortDescription: Elementary school serving the Sabang community.

name: Palangue Central Elementary School
shortDescription: One of the main elementary schools in the Palangue area.

name: Palangue Covered Court
shortDescription: Community covered court used for basketball games and barangay events.

name: Palangue Barangay Hall
shortDescription: Government office providing local services to Palangue residents.

name: Palangue Public Market
shortDescription: Small local market offering fresh produce and daily goods.
